lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Phillies have signed third baseman Pedro Feliz to a two-year, $8.5 million contract, the club announced Thursday. Feliz is a strong defensive player who was available as a free agent after his contract with the Giants expired.
snippet: The Philadelphia Phillies have signed third baseman Pedro Feliz to a two-year, $8.5 million contract, the club announced Thursday. Feliz is a strong defensive player who was available as a free agent after his contract with the Giants expired.
